Location: HYBRID HEARING - Council Chambers - City Hall

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the administration for children’s services to report on the impact of the deaths of parents and guardians from COVID-19 on children and the repeal of such requirement upon the expiration thereof
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Report on the impact of the deaths of parents and guardians from COVID-19 on children and the repeal of such requirement upon the expiration thereof.

Items.Title: Oversight - Juvenile Detention in NYC
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the administration for children’s services to provide a multilingual disclosure form to parents or guardians during a child protective investigation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the administration for children’s services to provide a multilingual disclosure form to parents or guardians during a child protective investigation.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Office of Children and Family Services to prohibit juvenile justice agencies from using room confinement as a form of restraint in secure detention facilities and from using transitional hold as a form of restraint in detention and placement facilities.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Office of Children and Family Services to prohibit juvenile justice agencies from using room confinement as a form of restraint in secure detention facilities.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Abreu and Feliz

Items.Title: Oversight - Juvenile Detention in NYC
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
